author: siladu
content:
I just want to clarify https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7691 's update fraction change...

`BLOB_BASE_FEE_UPDATE_FRACTION_ELECTRA | 5007716` is confusing because _ELECTRA is a CL suffix and `BLOB_BASE_FEE_UPDATE_FRACTION` !=  `BLOB_GAS_PRICE_UPDATE_FRACTION` as per https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4844, 
but I'm pretty sure this is a change on the EL side.

Are we simply updating the **Cancun** value of `BLOB_GAS_PRICE_UPDATE_FRACTION = 3338477` in **Prague** to `BLOB_GAS_PRICE_UPDATE_FRACTION = 5007716` ?
And no change to the calculation itself?

author: nero_eth
content:
Yeah right. The rest of the base fee mechanism stays untouched.
The final value was chosen as a compromise base fee update sensitivity.
Check this PR for more context:
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9060
